channel.title: [PI] Removing An Object [PI]
channel.description: Im trying to Make a Skill Area and i Need to remove a door to get into the area i wana make it, how would i remove the door, im new to PI server but in delta i think it was in delate object but im not sure about PI

item.title: [PI] Removing An Object [PI]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=494568.msg3615814#msg3615814 date=1306962415]
yeah if u wanna spawn an object just do the same but it should be 0, 10); at the end
[/quote]the 0 is the rotation, the 10 is the object type. neither matters when adding / removing items

@op
read this http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,470354.msg3439024.html#msg3439024
before asking more questions[/quote]

guess i was wrong…

item.title: [PI] Removing An Object [PI]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

for PI find the object id by clicking on it then get the pos its in and go into object manager and scroll down to private int[][] customObjects = {{}}; public void loadCustomSpawns(Client c) {
and under one of the // or the codes add in c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(7129, 1923, 5012, 0, 10);

the 7129 is the object id, the 1923 is the x and 5012 is the y just add that in and change the 10 to 0 so it would look like this c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(7129, 1923, 5012, 0, 0);

tell me if this works or if u dont understand

Read full topic
